Description: Verify user can sign in with valid credentials stored in fixture file
Pre-conditions:
1. User has valid WiseAdmit account
2. User is on sign-in page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Load credentials from fixture
3. Enter valid email
4. Enter valid password
5. Click Sign In button
Test Data: Email: From fixture users.json | Password: From fixture users.json
Expected Result:
1. User is successfully logged in
2. User is redirected to dashboard
3. URL changes from /sign-in

Description: Verify user can sign in with credentials from environment variables
Pre-conditions:
1. User has valid WiseAdmit account
2. Credentials set in cypress.env.json
3. User is on sign-in page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Load credentials from env
3. Enter valid email
4. Enter valid password
5. Click Sign In button
Test Data: Email: From cypress.env.json | Password: From cypress.env.json
Expected Result:
1. User is successfully logged in
2. User is redirected to dashboard

Description: Verify all sign-in page elements are displayed correctly
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Verify email input is visible
3. Verify password input is visible
4. Verify sign-in button is visible
5. Verify sign-in button is enabled
Expected Result:
1. All form elements are visible
2. Sign-in button is enabled

Description: Verify user is redirected after successful login
Pre-conditions:
1. User has valid credentials
2. User is on sign-in page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Sign In
4. Wait for redirect
5. Verify URL changed
Expected Result:
1. User is redirected
2. URL does not contain /sign-in
3. Redirect completes within 10 seconds

Description: Verify session is maintained after successful login
Pre-conditions:
1. User has valid credentials
2. User is on sign-in page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Sign In
4. Verify session cookie/token exists
Expected Result:
1. Session cookie is created
2. OR localStorage token exists

Description: Verify error when email field is left empty
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Leave email field empty
3. Enter password
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify error message
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Login is prevented

Description: Verify error when password field is left empty
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter email
3. Leave password field empty
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify error message
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Login is prevented

Description: Verify error when both email and password are empty
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Leave both fields empty
3. Click Sign In
4. Verify error message
Expected Result:
1. Error message is displayed
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Form validation triggers

Description: Verify error for invalid email format
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter invalid email format
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify email validation error
Expected Result:
1. Email validation error shown
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Login is prevented

Description: Verify error when correct email but wrong password is entered
Pre-conditions:
1. User has valid account
2. User is on sign-in page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter incorrect password
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify authentication error
Expected Result:
1. Authentication error displayed
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Login is denied

Description: Verify error when attempting to sign in with non-existent account
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter non-existent email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify user not found error
Expected Result:
1. User not found error shown
2. User remains on sign-in page
3. Login is denied

Description: Test all invalid scenarios from fixture data
Pre-conditions:
1. User is on sign-in page
2. Invalid user data in fixture
Test Steps:
1. Load invalid users from fixture
2. For each invalid user:
   a. Clear form
   b. Enter credentials
   c. Click Sign In
   d. Verify error
   e. Verify stay on page
Expected Result:
1. Each scenario shows appropriate error
2. User remains on sign-in page for all
3. No scenario allows login

Description: Verify application prevents SQL injection attacks
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter SQL injection strings in email
3. Enter SQL injection strings in password
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify injection is prevented
Expected Result:
1. SQL injection is prevented
2. User is not logged in
3. No database errors exposed

Description: Verify application handles special characters in credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter email with special chars
3. Enter password with special chars
4. Click Sign In
5. Verify graceful handling
Expected Result:
1. Special characters handled correctly
2. Either error shown or login succeeds
3. No application crash

Description: Verify password is not exposed in page source or network
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to sign-in page
2. Enter password
3. Verify password field type
4. Check page source
5. Verify password not visible
Expected Result:
1. Password field has type='password'
2. Password not visible in page source
3. Password is masked in UI
